Package services

Class GitHubAPIImpl

java.lang.Object
services.GitHubAPIImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.libs.ws.DefaultBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.DefaultBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.JsonBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.JsonBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.XMLBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.XMLBodyWritables, GitHubAPI
public class GitHubAPIImpl extends Object implements play.libs.ws.WSBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyWritables, GitHubAPI
This class handles all API of GitHub.
Author:
SmitPateliya, Pradnya Kandarkar, Farheen Jamadar, Indraneel Rachakonda
